changelog: Major redesign: Liquid Glass branding for icon, favicon, og-image
New hero with animated ECG heartbeat line and pulsing gradient orbs
Desktop inline nav with CTA button, burger only on mobile
Animated stat counters that count up on scroll
New How It Works section with Connect/Create/Experience steps
Who It's For personas section for musicians, performers, wellness, artists
Built-in instruments grid showcasing all capabilities
Floating mobile CTA bar that appears after scrolling past hero
Gradient section dividers and noise texture overlay
Animated gradient borders on hover for all cards
Social media links section (Instagram, TikTok, YouTube)
Consistent Liquid Glass nav logo across all subpages
Service worker cache bumped to v4.0.0
Security headers: HSTS, CSP, COOP, CORP added
Caching: optimized for SVG (1 month), sitemap, robots, .well-known
Twitter Cards added to all subpages
Service worker cache bumped to v4.1.0
